ProductsDetail.Description:
A SLEEK TAKE ON A CHRISTMAS CLASSIC
\t
\t\t\t

Decorate with a Christmas tree that perfectly complements your style and space. Rich in colour and fullness, this tree accurately mimics the look of natural evergreens. Its lifelike True Needle foliage is designed with 40 different tip variations moulded from real Fraser fir branches, the most variety on any of our trees. Easy to set up, this narrow version of the BH Fraser Fir is a beautiful fit for any home.

Natural Characteristics

Widely regarded as the best Christmas tree species in nature, the Abies fraseri is native to the forests of North Carolina and surrounding Appalachian states in the U.S. Our BH Fraser Fir takes inspiration from this beautiful tree. Dark green needles with silver undersides, along with a more organically shaped treetop, accurately replicate the vibrant colour and natural silhouette of farm grown Fraser firs.

Details

  • Crafted with True Needle® foliage featuring 40 variations of Fraser fir branch tips for a more organic, lifelike look
  • Easy Plug® system incorporates light connections in the trunk, so lighting your tree is as simple as plugging it into a socket. Currently available on select trees. Click on the specifications below for more details.
  • Semi-fluffed branch tips feature memory wire for additional support when hanging baubles, and to reduce fluffing time in future years
ProductsDetail.ShortDescription:
INNOVATIVE IN-TRUNK LIGHTING SYSTEM
Help me Choose a Light Type

The BH Fraser Fir Narrow is offered pre-lit with a variety of lighting options and features Easy Plug technology. Light connections between sections are made automatically inside the tree’s patented trunk design. You only need to touch one light string during setup—the one you plug into the wall.

Trees with our innovative Colour+Clear LED light technology have 50% more lights than our standard clear lit trees. Switch between all clear, all colour, or both clear and colour lights with the touch of a button. Comes with a dimmer function to adjust light brightness to your desired levels. Colour+Clear LED trees remote control requires 1 CR2032 battery; included.

Easy Plug™ Setup
Light string connections between sections are made automatically inside the tree's trunk, so you only need to plug the tree into the wall.
Professionally Hand-Strung
UL® approved lights are professionally hand-strung to reduce the appearance of wires.
Candlelight™ LED Lights
Unlike the cold light emitted from traditional LEDs, our energy-efficient Candlelight™ LEDs provide a warm glow reminiscent of a candle's flame.
Energy-Saving LED Option
Because our energy-efficient LED lights have no filament, they cannot burn out.

LIFELIKE FOLIAGE

The BH Fraser Fir Narrow features a lush profile with vibrant green foliage and a nuanced silver sheen. Attached, hinged branches fold outward for fast and easy setup. Crafted from flame-retardant and non-allergenic materials.

Most Realistic
True Needle foliage (79%) with Classic Needles (21%) for fullness
Branch Detail
Full, lush needles with warm two-toned mixture of rich green tips and silver undersides. Intricate forked tips are accented by warm brown branches.
Narrow Profile
Gorgeous narrow figure with prominent forked tips to provide extra space for all of your baubles.

ProductsDetail.Description:
A TIMELESS FAVOURITE
\t
\t\t\t

Bring warmth and charm into your spaces with the enduring elegance of a well-loved classic. Crafted from the same lifelike needles as our BH Fraser Fir trees, this foliage collection helps you create a picture-perfect Christmas at home.

  • All products in this collection feature True Needle® foliage for unsurpassed realism
  • Offered unlit or pre-lit with battery-operated clear LED lights
  • Each pre-lit item requires 4 AA batteries; not included
  • Pre-lit variety comes with a built-in timer; 6 hours on, 18 hours off
  • Wreath is offered in 18" and 24" diameter sizes
  • Garland
    • Offered in 6' and 10' length sizes
    • Each garland measures 12" wide
  • Outdoor-safe with UV protection. To last longer, we recommend outdoor display for a total of 3 months per year.
ProductsDetail.ShortDescription:
INDUSTRY-LEADING LIGHTS
Help me Choose a Light Type

The Fraser Fir Foliage is offered unlit or pre-lit with battery-operated premium clear lights.

Professionally Hand-Strung
UL® approved lights are professionally hand-strung to reduce the appearance of wires.
Battery-Powered LED Option
Offered prelit with battery-powered indoor/outdoor LED lights.
Outdoor LED Lights
Offered with UL® approved outdoor/indoor LED lights for safe display indoors or outdoors.
Energy-Saving LED Option
Because our energy-efficient LED lights have no filament, they cannot burn out.

ProductsDetail.Description:
A CHRISTMAS CLASSIC
\t
\t\t\t

Bring the warmth of the season to your decorating with a lifelike replica of one of the most popular Christmas tree species. The BH Fraser Fir recreates the shape, colour, and fullness of its natural counterpart with breathtaking accuracy. Its lifelike True Needle foliage is designed with 40 different tip variations moulded from real Fraser fir branches, the most variety on any of our trees. This realistic Christmas tree provides an elegant backdrop that inspires unforgettable celebrations.

Natural Characteristics

Widely regarded as the best Christmas tree species in nature, the Abies fraseri is native to the forests of North Carolina and surrounding Appalachian states in the U.S. Our BH Fraser Fir takes inspiration from this beautiful tree. Dark green needles with silver undersides, along with a more organically shaped treetop, accurately replicate the vibrant colour and natural silhouette of farm grown Fraser firs.

Details

  • Crafted with True Needle® foliage featuring 40 variations of Fraser fir branch tips for a more organic, lifelike look
  • Easy Plug® system incorporates light connections in the trunk, so lighting your tree is as simple as plugging it into a socket. Currently available on select trees. Click on the specifications below for more details.
  • Semi-fluffed branch tips feature memory wire for additional support when hanging baubles, and to reduce fluffing time in future years
ProductsDetail.ShortDescription:
WIDEST RANGE OF LIGHTING OPTIONS
Help me Choose a Light Type

The BH Fraser Fir is offered pre-lit with a variety of lighting options and features Easy Plug technology. Light connections between sections are made automatically inside the tree’s patented trunk design. You only need to touch one light string during setup—the one you plug into the wall.

Trees with our innovative Colour+Clear LED light technology have 50% more lights than our standard clear lit trees. Switch between all clear, all colour, or both clear and colour lights with the touch of a button. Comes with a dimmer function to adjust light brightness to your desired levels. Colour+Clear LED trees remote control requires 1 CR2032 battery; included.

Twinkly LED lights allow you to create and control your own stunning light shows or choose from pre-set effects, straight from an app on your mobile phone.

WARNING: This product may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy when using the motion effect light modes.

Quality Lights
The very best lights available on the market. We optimize our light counts and bulb brightness to give each tree a balanced and warm festive glow.
Color + Clear™ Option
Our exclusive Color+Clear lighting system allows you to change from clear to multicolored lights effortlessly with our remote control.
Professionally Hand-Strung
UL® approved lights are professionally hand-strung to reduce the appearance of wires.
Candlelight™ LED Lights
Unlike the cold light emitted from traditional LEDs, our energy-efficient Candlelight™ LEDs provide a warm glow reminiscent of a candle's flame.

Its lifelike True Needle foliage is designed with 40 different tip variations moulded from real Fraser fir branches, the most variety on any of our trees. This realistic Christmas tree provides an elegant backdrop that inspires unforgettable celebrations.
attributeValues.promotionalMessage:
--
LIFELIKE FOLIAGE

The BH Fraser Fir features a lush, generous profile with vibrant green foliage and a nuanced silver sheen. Attached, hinged branches fold outward for fast and easy setup. Crafted from flame-retardant and non-allergenic materials.

Most Realistic
True Needle foliage (77%) with Classic Needles (23%) for fullness
Branch Detail
Full, lush needles with warm two-toned mixture of rich green tips and silver undersides. Intricate forked tips are accented by warm brown branches.
Lush, Full Profile
Substantial, flourishing silhouette with prominent forked tips to provide extra space for all your baubles.

ProductsDetail.Description:
SHIMMERING CHRISTMAS INSPIRATION
\t
\t\t\t

Crown your Christmas tree with glittering elegance. This collection brings a beautiful, embellished touch to your decorating.

    \t
  • Crafted from iron and decorated with sequins, beads, glitter, and fabric
    • \t
  • Classic Star\t
      \t\t
    • Features gold trim with gold and pearlescent accents
      • \t\t
    • Measures 10" long x 3" wide
      • \t
    \t
    • \t
  • Small Bethlehem Star\t
      \t\t
    • Features an 8-pointed star with silver and gold trim
      • \t\t
    • Measures 10" long x 2" wide
      • \t
    \t
    • \t
  • Large Bethlehem Star\t
      \t\t
    • Features an 8-pointed star with longer arms and silver and gold trim
      • \t\t
    • Measures 15.5" long x 2" wide
      • \t
    \t
    • \t
  • Comes with a pole stand and zip ties to secure topper to tree
    • \t
  • For indoor use only

ProductsDetail.ProductName: BH Essentials Mercury Glass Bauble Set
ProductsDetail.Description:
TIMELESS CHRISTMAS TREASURES
\t
\t\t\t

Lend a luxurious touch to your Christmas decorating with beautiful mercury glass baubles. Mix and match these vintage accents with other BH Essentials baubles or set as bowl fillers for tabletops and mantels.

    \t
  • Features a mix of shapes and designs with a glossy finish
    • \t
  • Made from durable 100% mercury glass
    • \t
  • Mini Mercury Glass Bauble Set\t
      \t\t
    • Weighs a total of 13 lbs
      • \t\t
    • Each measures 2" long x 2" wide x 2" high
      • \t
    \t
    • \t
  • Regular Mercury Glass Bauble Set:\t
      \t\t
    • Weighs a total of 33 lbs
      • \t\t
    • Each measures 3-3.5" long x 3-3.5" wide x 3-3.5" high
      • \t
    \t
    • \t
  • For indoor or covered outdoor use
